item.description:
Near the sleepy town of Winterhaven, a ruined keep overlooks a dormant gateway to the otherworldly realm known as the Shadowfell. Though this dark scar on the world has lain dormant for many years, an evil cleric of Orcus, Demon Prince of the Undead, seeks to reopen the gate. The only thing preventing the forces of darkness from sweeping across the land is a determined band of heroes...

The start of a new ongoing RPGA campaign! Bring your 1st level characters and a hearty appetite for adventure!
item.name: D&D RPGA Game Night - Keep on the Shadowfell
